text: Tahu Potiki (23 December 1966 – 27 August 2019) was a New Zealand Māori leader. He was chief executive of Te Rūnanga o Ngāi Tahu from 2002 to 2006. Potiki was born in Palmerston, Otago. Potiki died in Auckland on 27 August 2019, aged 52 from multiple organ failure. ==References== Category:1960s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:New Zealand politicians Category:New Zealand Māori people
title: Tahu Potiki
